elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve

Class StrictHeadMatchBSieve

  • java.lang.Object
    • elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve.Sieve
      • elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve.StrictHeadMatchBSieve

  • public class StrictHeadMatchBSieve
extends Sieve
    This Sieve links a Mention to an antecedent, if its head word matches any head word of the antecedents Discourse Entity. Compared to StrictHeadMatchASieve it drops the compatible modifiers requirement, but retains the word inclusion and I-within-I requirements
    Author:
    Julian
    See Also:
    SieveUtilities.entityHeadMatch(Mention, Mention), SieveUtilities.compatibleModifiers(Mention, Mention), SieveUtilities.IWithinI(Mention, Mention)
